meanings.definition: The process of creating images of the lymphatic system using imaging techniques.
meanings.sent1: Lymphographies help doctors see inside the body to check for any problems.
meanings.sent2: The hospital uses lymphographies to understand how the lymphatic system works.
meanings.sent3: During the class on lymphographies, the students giggled at the funny shapes of the lymphatic system.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a map of lymphographies, each node a different memory waiting to be explored.
meanings.sent5: The book vividly described the intricate details captured in the lymphographies, making it a fascinating read.

meanings.definition: The study or practice of creating images of the lymphatic system.
meanings.sent1: Learning about lymphographies involves understanding how to interpret the images correctly.
meanings.sent2: Researchers in the field of lymphographies are always looking for new ways to improve imaging techniques.
meanings.sent3: The art exhibit featured abstract paintings inspired by the colors seen in lymphographies.
meanings.sent4: Her passion for lymphographies was like a flame, burning brightly with each new discovery.
meanings.sent5: The museum displayed historical lymphographies, showcasing the evolution of medical imaging.
